title: Chinese prawn soup
ingredients: ['25 g (scant 1 oz) dried shrimps', '2.5 cm (1 in) piece fresh root ginger, sliced', '4 spring onions', '1 whole star anise', 'Soup', '6 dried Chinese mushrooms, about 15 g (½ oz) in total', '1 tsp toasted sesame oil', '2.5 cm (1 in) piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', '55 g (2 oz) bamboo shoots, cut into fine matchsticks', '125 g (4½ oz) cooked peeled shrimps or prawns', '2 tbsp light soy sauce', '1 tbsp fish sauce', '85 g (3 oz) fine Chinese egg noodles', 'fresh coriander leaves to garnish']
